comment: Easy A. Talks alot about current events alot. For a non history major this class was interesting. Super cool personality. Played piano and guitar with the jazz band in between classes.
Good lecture style. Wicked smart.

Better catch her after class or in her office because she takes forever to answer emails. Just go to her office. I did. She was in there every time. I like this class alot but she is a nazi when it comes to class policy. I thought this class was easy and most of my fiends did too she's just too strict.

Not a hard class she just dont care if you dont care. Dr. Shepherd does take about 2 days to answer emails but just go to her office youll catch her she was always in for me. Easy class. It was alot of reading but the in class assignments are super easy. Basic quiz but common sense.

fun lectures. does more than just read from the point and textbook. gets you to talk. there are pop quizzes but they are easy just for points. don't make her mad tho. I seen that encounter. I loved this class. just kinda strict but fun and easy if you are in class.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Hilarious--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: Love it.  Awesome class.  Nothing too stressful.

Shout out to Dr. Shepherd. I just finished this class today ridiculous easy final exam and it was my favorite. Easy class. fast grader. She is my favorite professor. I am gonna miss her. Always in her office during office hours and always had time for me and my few friends that randomly stopped in.

loved this class. Whoot Whoot. She mixes it up with articles and readings. She stand on business tho and some students had issues with that. This class is more like a conversation more so than powerpoint. She walks around the class and gets us engaged. I highly enjoyed this class. She answered my email in 24 hours. I didn't have a problem with that

This class stressed me out the entire semester. I emailed her for weeks about missing class due to being sick and she never responded. I learned nothing  in the actual class and had to do all my studying outside of it. Would not take again!
rating_tags: Tough grader--Beware of pop quizzes--Lecture heavy

comment: My favorite class. My favorite Professor.  dEF Calls it how she sees it and that can be off putting for some students. A hoot tho. Fun lectures and more of a conversation and that helps me remember. that's how all my classes were at UGA. Most profs at KSU just read from the powerpoint but she is the only one that dont. I like that.

Critical grader and enjoys giving pop quizzes. Only three tests but heavy grading for the answers and each question requires a paragraph to answer. If you ask her a question she will always respond with look at the syllabus even if the syllabus fails to answer the question.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Beware of pop quizzes--Lecture heavy

comment: From what ive seen if you cool with her she's cool with you but if you give attitude she gives it right back. I had zero problems with Dr. Shepherd. She's very matter of fact and to the point. She took the time to write me two letters of recommendation and didn't have to do that.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lecture heavy--Online Savvy

comment: Easy class. Quizzes are random but over stuff we talked about million times. I'vd had her twice for 2 different courses and its not hard. Goes over stuff in class. A higher level history class than high school for sure because alot of stuff isn't spoken about in high school. I liked this class. I got As both times.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Gives good feedback--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: Was not very kind when it came to answering any questions. Her grading was very critical and if you don't get the answer she wants it is all wrong with no partial credit and no explanation of why it was wrong. Posted a link to an English video on "clauses" because "you guys don't know how to use them". Overall, would not take this professor again.

Its alot of reading but not hard. If you can take a professor telling you want you did wrong. This was my favorite class. The freakin best. Post videos to help. Def the most diverse history class Ive ever had but she takes 48 hours to answer emails. Too long. Exams are easy and online. Final is super easy. impossible to fail this class..
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Hilarious--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: Gives good feedback if you can take it. pretty cutthroat but most of my professors are. The class is not hard. My favorite but it is alot of reading. She too direct somethings. Good class tho.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Amazing lectures --Beware of pop quizzes

comment: If you can read and write you can pass. Not hard at all but I was annoyed by the class full of dummies.

Good class but she just don't answer emails and that's annoying.The class is cool not hard she just don't play no games and can come off mean. Dr Shepherd is a pretty dope musicians too. Ive jammed with her whenever she goes over and plays with the music majors.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Online Savvy

comment: Big on reading and most of us called her a reading nazi but the class was fun. It's not your typical history class she relates it to other stuff. Too much writing and Stubborn and Stern on class policy i liked the class. Final was a easy presentation but she act stern sometimes.

I literally just finished Dr Shepherd 8 week class and it was my easiest class. She just mean sometimes. She all about business. Big on reading and just too strict. Me and my friends got As but she is just too right to the point and it do crush people
rating_tags: Tough grader--Get ready to read--Lecture heavy
